metadata.description: How aligned you are on what matters most in life
metadata.sentence_template: When it comes to values, you two are ___.

astrological_basis.what_it_measures: Saturn aspects show commitment style and life structure. Jupiter shows beliefs and growth direction. Sun shows core identity alignment.

planet_meanings.Jupiter: beliefs, growth direction, and what you expand toward

very_low.label: Cross-Wired
very_low.guidance: Core beliefs collide; serious long-term risk.

low.label: Split
low.guidance: Match on some things, clash on others; talk about non-negotiables.

mid.label: Side-by-Side
mid.guidance: Not identical but not opposites; how you live it out matters.

high.label: Aligned
high.guidance: Want similar things; emphasize stability this brings.

very_high.label: Same Page
very_high.guidance: Strong value sync; 'building the same kind of life.'
